message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item to you for $95. I think you'll find it's a great deal at this price.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. Would you be willing to consider that price?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. How about we meet in the middle at $90?
I'm still a bit above my budget, but I'm willing to go up to $87. Would you be willing to meet me there?
